title: Nirmala Sitharaman asks RBI to hold monthly meetings with startup, fintech firms
description: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman chaired a meeting with top executives of around 50 fintech firms to discuss regulatory issues and compliance. Private sector fintech firms like RazorPay, PhonePe, Google Pay, and Amazon Pay were present. The meeting was attended by officials from NPCI, RBI, and government ministries.
